headline: Recent selloff in Norwegian Cruise stock offers a buying opportunity: Stifel
summary: Investing.com -- The recent decline in Norwegian Cruise Line (NYSE:NCLH) Holdings shares “has created an incredible buying opportunity,” according to Stifel analysts, who have added the stock to their Stifel Select List.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NCLH) Surged on Earnings Beat And Guidance Raise
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Small Cap Value Strategy” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In 2024, mega-cap technology stocks, known as the “magnificent seven,” outperformed expectations. The bullish sentiment was driven by U.S. election results, strong earnings momentum, and a robust labor market. […]
